features: Custom three-capsule array: This professional USB mic produces clear, powerful, broadcast-quality sound for YouTube videos, Twitch game streaming, podcasting, Zoom meetings, music recording and more
Blue VOICE software: Elevate your streamings and recordings with clear broadcast vocal sound and entertain your audience with enhanced effects, advanced modulation and HD audio samples
Four pickup patterns: Flexible cardioid, omni, bidirectional, and stereo pickup patterns allow you to record in ways that would normally require multiple mics, for vocals, instruments and podcasts
Onboard audio controls: Headphone volume, pattern selection, instant mute, and mic gain put you in charge of every level of the audio recording and streaming process
Positionable design: Pivot the mic in relation to the sound source to optimize your sound quality thanks to the adjustable desktop stand and track your voice in real time with no-latency monitoring
Plug 'n Play: Set up the computer microphone in seconds with the included desktop stand or connect directly to a mic stand or boom arm and instantly start recording and streaming on Mac or PC
body.description: Yeti is a premium USB microphone, producing clear, powerful, broadcast-quality sound for music, podcasts, Twitch streaming, YouTube videos, and Zoom calls. With advanced Blue VO!CE* software, Yeti makes it easier than ever to achieve professional on-stream sound quality with enhanced broadcast vocal effects, advanced voice modulation and HD audio samples. Four pickup patterns offer incredible flexibility, allowing you to record and stream in ways that would normally require multiple microphones. Yeti also features studio controls for headphone volume, pattern selection, instant mute, and microphone gain that put you in charge of the recording process. Set up in seconds with the included desktop stand or connect directly to a mic stand or boom arm. *Requires download and installation of Logitech G HUB.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Blue’s Legendary Broadcast-Quality Sound Makes the professional difference for recording, streaming and building your audience. Custom Three-Capsule Array Produces clear, powerful, broadcast-quality sound for YouTube, game streaming, podcasting, conference calls and music. Onboard Audio Controls Studio controls for headphone volume, pattern selection, instant mute, and microphone gain put you in charge of every level of the recording and streaming process. Unique Positionable Design Adjust and pivot the microphone in relation to the sound source to optimize your sound quality.

Blue VO!CE Broadcast Vocal Effects Craft the perfect broadcast vocal sound and entertain your audience with enhanced effects, advanced modulation and HD audio samples. Requires download and installation of LOGITECH G HUB. Four Pickup Patterns Cardioid, omni, bidirectional, and stereo pickup patterns offer incredible flexibility, allowing you to record in ways that would normally require multiple microphones. No-Latency Monitoring Monitor your voice in real time mixed with the sound from your computer to make sure your streams sound great. Plug 'n Play on Mac and PC Instantly start recording and streaming on Mac or PC.

Four Patterns for Ultimate Versatility Four distinct pickup patterns allow you to record and stream in ways that would normally require multiple microphones. Cardioid Mode Perfect for podcasting, game streaming, YouTube productions, Skype calls, vocals and instruments, cardioid mode captures sound sources that are directly in front of the microphone. Omni Mode Omnidirectional mode picks up sound all around the microphone. Great for conference calls and captures the feeling of "being there." Bidirectional Mode Bidirectional mode picks up sound from both the front and rear of the microphone, but not the sides. Ideal for two-person podcasts. Stereo Mode Stereo mode picks up sound from left to right in front of the microphone. Great for recording music or a 3-person podcast.

Compare Blue Microphones 3 Condensers Capsules 4 Condensers 4 Patterns 4 USB Output USB 3 Condensers Capsules 1 Large Condenser 4 Patterns 1 USB Output XLR 3 Condensers Capsules 1 Large Condenser 4 Patterns 1 USB Output XLR

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Affordable and Quality Microphone
reviews.reviewText: While there may be better microphones out there, I would argue that the Blue Yeti is an excellent, but affordable option. Whether you are wanting it for work, gaming, streaming, or recording, it definitely gets the job done. One thing to note is that it is VERY sensitive and will catch even the quietest of sounds in a recording. I have been able to hear my neighbors through my headset, which was very shocking. If you're looking to get started with audio recording, I'd definitely recommend starting here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for record vocals
reviews.reviewText: I got this microphone for recording rap vocals. The quality is amazing for the price. This is easily the best microphone in the 100-300 price range. If you wanna start making music, making videos, recording podcasts, or just want a high quality microphone for zoom calls I recommend blue yeti's.My computer recognized it without any issues. If you plug headphones into it, you can hear your voice as you're recording. It's very helpful when making music. It has a dial with some settings, I use the one that records directly from the front. But if you were doing something like recording a podcast or video with other people you can have it record the entire room from all directions.Also the desk stand it comes with is really heavy and doesn't tip over, which is great when I accidently hit the decks and mic while recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I bought this sooner
reviews.reviewText: I don't know anything about microphones but this was recommended as a starter mic. When I saw it on sale for Black Friday I thought I would give it a try.It is well-built and very easy to use. I don't know much about mic patterns but I found the information on their site. I did a comparison test - Yeti vs headphones mic to see how much of a difference it made and it was night and day. Good sound quality and little background noise picked up.I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who wants to do podcasts, voiceovers, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid workhorse for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: Well I suppose its about time to actually review this mic considering how long I've had it. I purchased this mic in 2016 and for the last 7 years it has yet to let me down. This mic taken an unhealthy amount of abuse flying off my desk more times than I can count (teenage gamer rage), and traveled with me throughout my life. Between gaming and work for those last 7 years I could estimate I've used this mic for roughly 18,000 hours and its still going strong. It can be a little finicky to set up correctly to reduce background noise, but if your using discord or the Logitech software this is a breeze. Not to mention the sound quality is surprisingly good with a small amount of tweaking. If I had one gripe about this product it would be the USB connection to the mic can be a little weak but I blame that on myself and my younger years.If you are considering purchasing this mic I highly recommend it. For the price of this mic the value is immeasurable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mic, but expect a small amount of feedback.
reviews.reviewText: So, I got my hands on the Blue Yeti Mic a while ago, it's been great for my recording and streaming setup. The audio quality is mostly fantastic (has some slight feedback issues.) Whether I'm recording vocals, streaming games, or podcasting, this microphone delivers amazing sound that makes me feel like a pro.I love the fact that it's so easy to set up and use. It's a simple plug-and-play setup, so I didn't have to mess around with any complicated installations or extra equipment. Just plug it into my computer, and I'm good to go. Plus, the sleek and stylish blackout design adds to my setup.The Blue Yeti offers four different pickup patterns, which is a big plus. It's versatile enough to handle any situation. Whether I want to focus on my own voice, capture the whole room, conduct interviews, or even record in stereo, this microphone has got me covered.Now, there is one small thing worth mentioning. I did experience a bit of a feedback issue when using the microphone at higher volume levels. It's not a deal-breaker for me, but it would have been nice if the microphone handled those levels a bit better. It's something to keep in mind if you tend to crank up the volume.The microphone is a solid choice for anyone looking to up their recording or streaming game. The sound quality is great, and the flexibility of the pickup patterns is a huge plus. Just be mindful of the feedback at higher volume levels. That being said, I highly recommend giving this microphone a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value and function
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mic for gaming or podcasting. I got it as gift for my boyfriend since he games a lot and multiple reviews on different platforms rated this as a top mic. It is a little too nice - he swapped his headphones that comes with a mic out for this and even his friends mention how much better his voice is coming through the mic. I can imagine this to be a great gift for anyone that is into gaming or podcasting or even works from home.I do want to share that the mic comes with a stand and so far is great for smaller desk spaces or even larger ones but it is wired as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality, great sound!!!
reviews.reviewText: I use this for recording readings. The sound is crisp and clean. Easy install and you are off. Adding another software package to enhance the overall sound you want is an option.

I knew this mic would be perfect for streaming and gaming because I have talked to numerous people who own/use Yeti Blue every day, and it is exactly what you want. Unless you are spending over $200. This mic is built properly, it's tough and weighty, it sounds amazing, and it's plug and use. A non-tech savvy grandmother could set this up. Pay the little extra and you're set.The only note I will make is that if you are using a mic arm (highly suggested, professional looking and if you bump your desk with the stock table-base setup, it will cause playback) So get a microphone arm and order the mic screw adapters (on amazon) by avatarr. 1cm thread, adaptable to 19mm which is the yeti thread size. I got a mic arm at a pawn ship for $30, lucky but don't spend over $50 on a mic arm unless you are rich and starved for time. They are cheaply made and easily found at pawn/music shops.Happy creating, have fun and take care. Also, spread love.
Ele capta até os passos de uma formiga atravessando a rua, é muito bom! Qualidade extrema mas você pode regular a sensibilidade de captação, então eu recomendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un vrai micro avec un son incroyable
reviews.reviewText: Mon fils qui réalise des streams, cherchais un micro de qualité et bien il n’est pas déçu.Il y a beaucoup d’option avec le logiciel pour isoler les sons.De plus le prix est plus que raisonnable.Le son est incroyable .

reviews.reviewTitle: Microfono USB versatile e di alta qualità, tra i migliori, ma…
reviews.reviewText: Il Blue Yeti è un microfono USB a condensatore che offre una qualità del suono eccellente e una versatilità senza pari. È perfetto per una vasta gamma di applicazioni, tra cui registrazione, streaming, gaming e podcasting.Qualità del suonoIl Blue Yeti offre una qualità del suono eccellente, con un suono chiaro e cristallino. È dotato di un diaframma a capsula da 16 mm che offre un'ampia risposta in frequenza e una sensibilità elevata. Il microfono è disponibile in tre modalità di pickup: cardioide, omnidirezionale e stereo.VersatilitàIl Blue Yeti è un microfono estremamente versatile. Può essere utilizzato per una vasta gamma di applicazioni, tra cui:Registrazione di voci, musica e altri suoniStreaming di giochi o altri contenuti onlinePodcastingRegistrazione di interviste o conferenzeIl microfono è facile da configurare e utilizzare. È plug-and-play, quindi è sufficiente collegarlo al computer e iniziare a registrare.DesignIl Blue Yeti ha un design robusto e ben fatto. È realizzato in plastica di alta qualità e ha un'asta regolabile che consente di posizionarlo in modo ottimale. Il microfono include anche un supporto antiurto che aiuta a ridurre il rumore di manipolazione.ControL'unico vero contro del Blue Yeti è il suo prezzo. È un microfono di alta qualità, ma è anche uno dei più costosi sul mercato.ConclusioneIl Blue Yeti è un microfono USB versatile e di alta qualità che offre una qualità del suono eccellente e una vasta gamma di funzionalità. È un'ottima scelta per utenti che cercano un microfono professionale per una varietà di applicazioni.Pro:Qualità del suono eccellenteVersatilità senza pariDesign robusto e ben fattoContro:Collegamento solo Usb

reviews.reviewTitle: Un micro pour débutant et presque pro
reviews.reviewText: Je n’avais encore jamais eu de vrai microphone. J’avais vu sur internet que beaucoup de vidéaste l’utilisait et avait vu aussi beaucoup de gens en dire du négatif.Je me suis laissé tenter, et quel bonheur !Je l’utilise surtout pour mes discussions tardives et en jeu et ils fonctionnent parfaitement.Les différentes molettes ( volume, réglage de l’intensité et réglages du mode de capture de son ) sont de très bonnes qualités et sont les seuls éléments en plastique.Un défaut, le micro capte tous les coups ( même les moindres ) que l’ont peut faire sans faire exprès sur le bureau ou sur le pied du micro.Mais sinon RAS foncez si vous voulez une bonne qualité de son dans un budget raisonnable.
